TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, you get the word nothing made of tungsten shot down onto your residence from orbit...

I wish there was no LaGG-3.

Granted. There is an overload of MiG-15 instead.

I wish that the cold war left russia without military or political power.

Granted. China takes its place, and is just as bad.

I wish for whirled pees.

Granted, the planet accepts pee as its new ruler. Wars happen more often then ever.

I wish that the cold war left America without military or political power.

Granted. Canada takes its place,making canada plant maple leaf trees all over america.

I wish to have a tardis

Granted. You have no idea how to use it and end up in a black hole.

I wish to be a captain of a huge interstellar fleet of alien invasive force.

Granted. As captain you are held responsible when the initial attack is beaten back by an onslaught of Ion Cannons and Mammoth Tanks and your Supreme Overlord executes you (And your comrades) for incompetence.

I wish I could be the Supreme Overlord.

Granted. You get executed by earthlings when the same attack fails a second time due to your incompetence.

I wish i could be the leader of the earthlings.

Granted. but suddenly,you die in a mountain of anvils,No one is the leader.

I wish to have a butterbeer.

Granted. It teleports you to the Harry Potter universe where you get killed by Voldemort.

I wish I wasn't so tired right now.

Granted, you now suffer from severe insomnia. No amount of sleep aiding drugs or practices help you fall asleep.

I wish I didn't have a week of mock-exams.

Granted. They suddenly become your real exams. Good luck!

I wish that my report was done right now.

Granted. You're report is done... Drafting.

I wish for a new string of barbed wire.

Or a copy of Battletoads, that works to.

Edited February 23, 2015 by Xannari Ferrows

Granted. You recieve a copy of Battletoads, but upon loading the cartridge it only displays a picture of barbed wire on the screen.

I wish I had enough money to buy a better telescope.

Granted. The mirror comes uncollimated from the factory, and no amount of fiddling fixes it.

I wish for omniscience.

Granted. You'll never understand it.

I wish to fly a SR-71.

Granted. you fly it,but you crash instantly.

I wish for Blackbeards pirate ship.

Granted. you cant sail it, and you get arrested for piracy

I wish for a cup of Earl Grey

Granted. You recieve a cup with a picture of some person named Earl, stained gray with spraypaint.

I wish for a ride home to play some more KSP.

Granted. Jeb is your driver and he lithobrakes to stop at your house.

I wish for a peaceful, tranquil day.

Granted. Yet you obtain a nagging feeling that you forgot to do something.

I wish for a 2015 corvette z06

Granted. It gets stolen instantly by a group of monkeys.

I wish to know everything.

Ninja'd...

Granted, but you end up forgetting most of it.

I wish for a less-restrictive filter on my school's internet.

Granted but now the bandwidth Is clogged and the network is overloaded.

I wish to be finished with school.

Granted. You are expelled and can only work as a dishwasher for the rest of your life.

I wish dishwashing paid better.
